manzils.text: Ism
Atnan issekniyen n Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ahat tqelqev iman ik, imi ur ppilin d lmumnin
Ma ihwa ya£, ad asen d Nessers assekni seg igenni, ad iinzent, zdat es, tmegoav nnsen, s wannuz
Ur ten id ippas usmekti amaynut, s$uo Uenin, mebla ma u$alen as d inekkaoen
Ni$ skaddben. Ihi, ad asen d asen isallen, $ef wayen i$ef pmmaaliken
Day ur walan ara tamurt? Aceal i Nessenker degs n yal tayuga tukyist
Deg wayagi, s tidep, assekni. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Mi Issawel Mass ik, i Musa: "oue s agdud imednas
agdud n Feraun. Day ur ppezziben ara
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek ugade$ ad iyi skiddben
ad sekkwoen idmaren iw, ur ipserrie yiles iw. Ihi, Azen ar Haoun
U denbe$ $uosen. Ugade$ ad iyi n$en
Inna: "Xaii, oueet s issekniyen nne£. Aql a£ yidwen, Nessemeas en. Oo
Oueet ar Feraun, tinem as: "nekwni d amazan n Mass imavalen
Seddu, yidne$, At Isoail
Inna: "day ur k noebba ara $uone$, d llufan? U tesaaddav $uone$, iseggwasen di laameo ik
u txedmev igi txedmev. Kecc, seg ijehliyen
Inna: "xedme$ t asmi lli$ seg im$eooqen
Rewle$ segwen, mi kwen ugade$. Ifka yi Mass iw, uuwab. Irra yi seg imazanen
D l$it agi, i$ef a yi teppezzmev, i k ibbwin a pperrev, At Isoail, d aklan
Inna Feraun: "d acu T Mass imavalen
Inna: "d Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, ma tetebbtem
Inna i wi s d izzin: "la tsellem
Inna: "Mass nnwen, u Mass n lejdud nnwen, imezwura
Inna: "s tidep, amazan nnwen id ippuceggaen $uowen, d aoehbani
Inna: "Mass n ugmuv, utaram, akked wayen illan garasen, lemmer tefhimem
Inna: "ma tedmev Oebbi, ur nelli d nek, a k nerr ar leebs
Inna: "i lemmer ad ak d awi$ ayen ipbegginen
Inna: "awi t id, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Iveggeo taakwazt is, tu$al d azrem n uuee
Issuffe$ ed afus is, d$a d amellal i imfeooen
Inna i imvebboen i s d izzin: "wagi, s tidep, d aseeear amusnaw
ib$a a kwen issuffe$, s sseur is, seg wakal nnwen. D acu t lameo nnwen
Nnan: "sgani t, neppa akked gma s; azen ineccaden ar temdinin
ad ak d awin yal aseeear amusnaw
Mlalen iseeearen, di lweqt akked wass ipwassnen
Nnan i imdanen: "ma ad tenjemaam
Ahat a neddu d iseeearen, ma d nitni ara irebeen
Mi d usan iseeearen, nnan as i Feraun: "ma ad a$ tili teqdiat, ma nerbee
Inna: "ih, d$a, kunwi, war ccekk, a ppu$alem seg iqoiben
Inna yasen Musa: "veggoet ayen ara tveggoem
Veggoen imraren akked taakwzin nnsen. Nnan: "s tezmert n Feraun, ard nekwni ara irebeen
Iveggeo Musa taakwazt is. Apan tesseblaa ayen id snulfan
Iseeearen $lin, knan
Nnan: "numen s Mass imavalen
Mass n Musa akked Haoun
Inna: "tumnem yiS, uqbel ma serree$ awen? Neppa, war ccekk, d ameqwoan nnwen i wen isseefven sseur. A ppeeoem, ad awen gezme$ afus sya, avao sya; a kwen uuemoe$ akw $ef umidag
Nnan: "ulac u$ilif, acku ar Mass nne$, ara nezzi
Ih, nessaram ad Isemmee, Mass nne$, tuccva nne$ imi aql a$ d lmumnin imenza
Nweeea i Musa: "ooue s ugdud iW, deg iv, acku a kwen in vefoen
Iuzen Feraun ineccaden ar temdinin
wigi, s tidep, d arbaa amejiue
u nitni, s tidep, sserfan a
Nekwni, Neqquoa akken ma nella
Ihi, Nessuffe$ iten id si tebeirin akked tliwa
igerrujen, ixxamen ukyisen
Akka, nweooet yissen, At Isoail
Vefoen ten mi d inqeo yiiij
Mi mwalan irebbuyaa, nnan imeddukwal n Musa: "aql a$ a nepwaleeq
Inna: "xaii! Mass iw, s tidep, yidi. Ad iyi Inhu
Nweeea i Musa: "wwet ill s taakwazt ik"! Imfaoaq, yal loiha am udrar ameqwoaean
Nessqeob ed wiyav ar dinna
Nsellek Musa, akked wid akw iddan yides
Sinna ne$oeq wiyav
Deg wayagi, s tidep, d assekni. Tegwti degsen ur uminen
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Eeku yasen d tamacahup n Iboahim
Mi inna i baba s akked ugdud is: "d acu taabdem
Nnan: "naabed tiaancuoin, mazal a tent njjem
Inna: "day awen d sellent, ma tnujem
Ne$ nefaant kwen, ne$ vuooent kwen
Nnan: "xaii, nufa d imezwura nne$, akka ay xeddmen
Inna: "day twalam ayen la taabdem
kunwi akked lejdud nnwen imenza
Nitni d icenga w. Siwa kan Mass imavalen
iyi Ixelqen; Neppa iyi Inhan
Neppa iyi Icceccan, iyi Isswan
Neppa iyi Isseeluyen ma uvne
ara iyi In$en, sinna, ara iyi d Ssidren
u, oe$be$, d Win ara Isemmeen tuccva w, ass iqeiiiyen
A Mass iw, £it iyi d, s uuwab. Ssemlil iyi d iaaoviyen
Err awal iw, d win n tidep, i ineggura
Err iyi si lweooat n Loennet n ssuaada
Semmee i baba. Neppa, s tidep, illa seg im$eooqen
Ur iyi Xezzu, ass n tnekra nnsen
ass ideg ur infaa wayla, ne$ derya
siwa win iqublen Oebbi, s wul unuie
A d teppae Loennet, ar wid ipeezziben
A d innunnet ujajie ar im$eooqen
Ad asen inin: "anda ten wid tellam taabdem
war Oebbi? Day a kwen ssellken, ne$ ad ssellken iman nnsen
Ad pwagren degs, nitni, akked wid i$elien
akked laaskeo n Iblis, akken ma llan
Ad inin; u nitni, degs, ppemqellaan
s Oebbi, ar nella di ttelfan n uuee
mi kwen nessaadel ar Mass imavalen
D ibe$wviyen kan i a$ itelfen
Ur nesai imcafaen
ne$ aebib i $ ieemmlen
Lemmer ad as nales, a nili d lmumnin
Deg wayagi, s tidep, assekni. Tegwti, degsen, ur uminen
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n Nue iskaddeb imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen Nue: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Nnan: "day a k namen, mi ddan yidek imezwura n laaouo
Inna: "ur eoi$ ayen xeddmen
Aqeiii nnsen $eo Mass iw kan, lemmer tessinem
Ur swexxioe$, nek, lmumnin
Nek d aneddao kan ipbeginnen
Nnan: "ma ur tfukkev, a Nue, war ccekk, a ppepwaoeomev
Inna: "a Mass iw! S tidep, inkeo iyi ugdud iw
Seyyi ferru gari yidsen. Sellek a$, nek, akked lmumnin i illan yidi
Nsellek it, neppa, akked wid illan yides, di lbabuo iccuoen
Sinna, deffir waya, Ne$ves wid igwran
Deg wayagi, d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Aad skaddben imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen Hud: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Day a tbennum, di yal ti$ilt, assekni i tfukal nnwen
La tepparam lebouj, amar haat a pwekkoem
Ma tewwtem, tekkatem s leqsee
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Eezzbet i Win i wen Ifkan ayen teeoam
Ifka yawen lmal, tarwa
tibeirin, tiliwa
Nek, ugade$ aaaqeb fellawen, ass ameqwoaean
Nnan: "iaadel $uone$ tnubav, ne$ ur tnubav
Ih, ayagi, siwa d asnulfu imezwura
Ur nelli d wid ara ippuaaqben
Nekoen t. Nesqucc iten. Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Tamud skaddben imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen UuUalie: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Day a kwen ooen, deg wayen illan dagi, testumnem
Di tebeirin akked tliwa
deg igran, tizdayin s ppemoa leqqaqen
La tneooem, d ccaioin, ixxamen deg idurar
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur ssemeaset i lameo iballa$en
i issefsaden di tmurt, ur pleqqimen
Nnan: "kecc, aql ak kan, seg ioehbaniyen
Kecc d amdan kan, am nekwni. Awi d assekni, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Inna: "tal$wemt agi, a ppessew deg wass is, kunwi a ppesswem deg wass nnwen
£uowat a p tevvuoem, mulac a kwen iwwet uaaqeb, deg wass abarar
Gezmen as tigwecrar, gwran d di nndama
Iwwet iten uaaqeb. Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n Lui iskaddeb imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen UuLui: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Teppeddum ar ddkeo deg imavalen
Teooam tilawin i wen d Ixleq Mass nnwen? Ihi, kunwi d agdud izegren tilas
Nnan: "ma ur tfukkev, a Lui, a k nenfu
Inna: "nek, seg wid ikeohen igiten nnwen
A Mass iw, sellek iyi, nek akked twacult iw, seg igiten nnsen
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, meooa
siwa tam$aot, ar wid igwran
Sinna, Nessenger wiyav
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur. I icmet ugeffur n wid ippunedoen
Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n At Teegi iskaddeb imazanen
Mi sen inna Cuaayeb: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Ktilet s lewqama; ur ppilit seg wid issenqasen
Weznet s lmizan uwqim
Ur ccmatet i medden, ayla nnsen; ur ssexsaoet di tmurt s usefsed
Eezzbet i Win ikwen Ixelqen, kunwi akked isuta imenza
Nnan: "kecc, aql ak kan, seg ioehbaniyen
Kecc, d amdan kan, am nekwni. Neesb ik seg wid iskiddiben
Sse$li d fellane$ igezman igenni, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Inna: "Mass iw Ieoa, sennig wiyav, ayen txeddmem
Skaddben t. Iwwet iten uaaqeb, deg wass n tillas. D aaaqeb, s tidep, n wass abarar
Deg wayagi, d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, ar Neppa d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Ar wagi, war ccekk, d ayen id Issers Mass imavalen
Irs ed, yides, ooue n laman
ef wul ik, iwakken a ppiliv seg wid inedoen
s umeslay aaoab ipbegginen
Neppa, s tidep, deg Ihellilen imezwura
Day ur illi ara d assekni i nitni, mi t ssnen imusnawen n At Isoail
Lemmer it id Nessers, i yiwen seg ibeooaniyen
u i$oa yasen t, ur ppamnen yis
Akka, Nessawev it ar wulawen ibe$wviyen
Ur ppamnen yis, alamma walan aaaqeb aqeoean
A ten id ias, deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Ad inin: "amendeo ma neggani
Day earen s aaaqeb nne£
Day ur twalav ara, N$at iten, d iseggwasen
Sinna, iusa ten id wayen i sen ippuwaaaden
Ula i sen d ibbwi wayen is stumnen
Ur Nesqucc tamdint, siwa tin isaan ineddaoen
i usmekti. Ur Nelli d imednas
Ur d risen yides ccwaien
Ur asen issefk, ur zmiren
Nitni, s tidep, pwaaezlen $ef tmesliwt
Ur naao, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven. Mulac a ppiliv seg wid ara ippuaaqben
Nabi llezm ik i k iqeoben mavi
Ezger tacvai ik $ef wi i k ivefoen si lmumnin
Ma auuan k, ini: "ur ppka$ deg wayen txeddmem
Ppkel $ef Uzmir Ipeunun
I k Ipwalin mara tbeddev
mara d tezziv ar wid iknan
Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ad awen mle$ anwi i$ef d prusun ccwaien
Prusun ed $ef yal akeddab idensen
Ppaken tameeeu$t. Tegwti degsen d ikeddaben
Imedyazen, iiafaoen ten im$eooqen
Day ur twalav ara, ar nitni, di yal ta$zut pmeniaoen
U nitni qqaoen ayen ur xeddmen
Kkes ed wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, id ismektayen aias Oebbi, i irebeen mbaad ma pwadensen. Ad eoen, wid idensen, tama anida ara ppin
Is. Atnan issekniyen n Leqwoan, akked Tezmamt ipbegginen
D nnhaya u d abecceo i lmumnin
wid ibedden i teallit, ippaken zzakat, ipputebbten $ef laxeot nnsen
Ih, wid ur numin ara s laxeot, Ncebbee asen igiten nnsen, d$a ddebdeben
Widak, fellasen aaaqeb ucmit mavi. Di laxeot, d nitni ara ixesoen ugwar
S tidep, kecc iusa k id Leqwoan, s$uo Bab n uuwab, Amusnaw
Mi inna Musa i twacult is: "nek wala$ times, ad awen d awi$, segs, asali, ne$ ad awen d awi$ asafu ioeqqen, amar a ppesseemum
Mi ibbwev $uoes, ipwanced: "ad ioqu wayen illan di tmes, akked wayen i as d izzin. Gedha s Oebbi, Mass imavalen
A Musa! Ih, Nek d Oebbi, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Veggeo taakwazt ik"! Mi p iwala la tesseeoiiiw, amzun d azrem, ibren, ur iwexxeo. "A Musa! Ur ppagwad! Ar $uoI, ih, ur ppagwaden imazanen
siwa win idensen, sinna, iu$al iwqem, deffir tuccva. Nek, s tidep, Psemmiee$, Peunnu
Ger afus ik di loib ik, a d iffe$ d amellal, ur ihlik. Si tza issekniyen, i Feraun akked ugdud is. Nitni, war ccekk, d agdud icemten
Mi ten id usan issekniyen nne£, ainani, nnan: "wagi iban d sseur
Ugin ten s ddens d pnefxa, u, deg iman nnsen, pputebbten. Wali, ihi, amek tevoa d ifessaden
Ni$ Nefka tamusni i Dawed akked Sliman. Nnan: "ccekoan i Oebbi, i a$ Ismenyafen i waiau n yimdanen iumnen
Sliman iwoet Dawed, u inna: "a yimdanen! Nepwaselmed tutlayt n yifoax; ippunefk a$ si yal cci. Ayagi, s tidep, ard lfevl n uuee
Pwajemmlen d, i Sliman, i²asekoiwen is si leonun, imdanen, ifoax. Mdarraren
Armi, mi bbwven ar te$zut n twevfin, tenna d tweiuft: "a yaweiiuf, kecmemt ar ixxamen nnkwent, mulac, war ccekk, a kwent ied Sliman, neppa akked iasekoiwen is, ur faqen
Icmumee, ivua, $ef wayen d tenna. Inna: "a Mass iw! Err iyi ad snemmre$ l$it iK, is i $ T$atev, nek akked imawlan iw; ad xedme$ ise$ ara Toaviv; Ssekcem iyi, s ueunu K, ar imdanen iK imaanen
Issefqed ifoax, inna: "acimi ur wala$ ara iccibib, day d l$ayeb
War ccekk, ad saaddi$ fellas aaaqeb uqsie, ne$ a t zlu$, ne$ a d iawi tasebbiwt tubrizt
Ur iaaiiel ara. Inna d: "fehme$ ayen ur tefhimev. Usi$ d $uoek si Saba, s usali unuie
Ih, ufi$ en tameiiut d tagellii nnsen. Ippunefk as si yal cci. £uoes asgeld abarar
Ufi$ p in, neppat akked ugdud is, la kennun i yiiij, war Oebbi. Cciian icebbee asen igiten nnsen. Iveof iten seg ubrid, d$a nitni ur pwanhan
Acimi ur knan ara i Oebbi, id Issufu$en lesrar, di tmurt akked igenwan, i Ieoan ayen teppeffrem u ayen d tepberrieem
Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, Mass n usgeld ameqwoaean
Inna: "a neeo ma tessawlev d tidep, ne$ ma kecc seg ikeddaben
Oue s teboap iw agi, veggeo asen p, sinna, wexxeo asen, wali acu ara d rren
Tenna: "a yimvebboen, tepwaveggeo iyi d teboap tukyist
Ih, s$uo Sliman. Apan: s yisem n Oebbi Aenin Ipeunun
Ur ssem$waoet ara iman nnwen $uoi, aset ed $uoi, d imvuaen
Tenna: "a yimvebboen, fket ed ooay nnwen af lameo iw. Ur pseyyi$ lameo, siwa garawen
Nnan: "nekwni d imawlan n tezmert, nesaa lemeella tuqsiet. Lameo i kem. Muqel d acu ara d tseyyiv
Tenna: "s tidep, igeldan ssefsaden tamdint ara kecmen. Sdullun imdanen is laali. Akka ay xeddmen
Nek, ad asen azne$ tarzeft, ad aoou$ acu ara d awin imcegaan
Mi tebbwev ar Sliman, inna: "day ad iyi taawnem s terkunt? Ayen i yi Ifka Oebbi, yif ayen i wen Ifka. D kunwi kan i ifeoeen, s terzeft nnwen
U$al $uosen. Ih, a noue $uosen s laaskeo, iwumi ur zmiren. A ten id nessuffe$, syenna, ndellen, d imejiueen
Inna: "a yimvebboen, anwa degwen, ara yi d iawin asgeld is, uqbel a yi d asen d imvuaen
Aafrit si leonun, inna d: "ad ak t id awi$, uqbel ma tekkrev seg umekkan ik. I wayagi, war ccekk, nek d uzmir muman

Inna d bab n tmusni si Tezmamt: "nek ad ak t id awi$, uqbel a pfukkev asmeomec". Mi t iwala irs ed $uoes, inna: "wagi si lfevl n Mass iw, ad iyi ijeooeb ma ad snemmre$, ne$ ma ad jehle$. Win isnemmren, isnemmer kan i iman is. Win ijehl, ihi, Mass iw d Asaay, d Ukyis
Inna: "bedlet as udem usgeld is, a neeo ma tepwanha, ne$ haap seg wid ur nepwanha
Mi d tusa, nnan as: "day am wagi, usgeld inem"? Terra d: "amzun d neppa". "Tusa ya$ d tmusni, uqbel neppat, nuzen
Isoue ip wayen tunez, war Oebbi. Tella, s tidep, seg ugdud ijehliyen

Nnan as: "ekcem ar lbeoo"! Mi t twala, t$il degs aman; tesban ed ifadden is. Inna: "s tidep, d lbeoo ulelluc imzin". Tenna: "a Mass iw! Ih, dense$ iman iw. Akked Sliman, unze$ aS i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Ni$ Nuzen ed, i Tamud, gmat sen Ualie: "aabdet Oebbi"! Maca, rran snat n trebbuya$, ppemnamarent
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acimi tep$awalem ar tucmip, uqbel ise$? Lemmer a ppeste$foem Oebbi, ahat aeunu fellawen
Nnan: "tkeeeesev a$, kecc akked wi iddan yidek". Inna: "lfal nnwen ar Oebbi, u kunwi d agdud ara ippuhewwlen
Llan, di temdint, tza iterrasen i issefsaden di tmurt, ur pleqqimen
Nnan: "yyaw a nemmesgal s Oebbi, ard a neevem deg iv fellas, neppa akked twacult is. Sinna, a nini i bab is: ur nelli d inagan n tmen$iwt n tawacult is. Ih, nekwni, d imawlan n tidep
Undin ticeokep, Nundi ticeokep, nitni ur faqen
Wali amek tevoa di tceokep nnsen. Nen$ed iten, nitni, akked ugdud nnsen, meooa
Atnan hudden ixxamen nnsen, ilmend n ddens nnsen. Deg wayagi, war ccekk, assekni i ugdud issnen
Nsellek wid iumnen u llan peezziben
I Lui, mi inna i ugdud is: "teppeddum ar wayen n dir, u kunwi tepwalim
Ih, kunwi teppeddum ar irgazen, teb$am ten, war tilawin. Ih, kunwi d agdud ur nessin
Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi d nnan: "ssuff$et tawacult n Lui, si temdint nnwen, nitni d imdanen i ib$an tezdeg
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameiiut is. Nseyya a ppili seg wid igwran
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur. I icmet ugeffur n wid ippunedoen
Ini: "ccekoan i Oebbi. Talwit i imdanen iS, wid Ifren". Ppif Oebbi, ne$ ayen pcaraken

Day Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, i wen d Isse$lin aman, seg igenni - Nessenkar, yissen, iqwioen ippembehwaoen, ur teewaoem a d tessem$im ttjuo is -, day illa oebbi, ar tama n Oebbi? Maca, nitni d agdud issaadalen
Day Win Irran tamurt d tanezdu$t, Irra degs isaffen, Irra yas idurar, Irra agadir ger sin ilellen, day illa oebbi ar tama n Oebbi? Xaii, tegwti degsen, ur ssinen
Day Win Issemeasen i umevouo, mara S d isiwel; Itekksen ayen n dir; i kwen Ipparan d igensas di tmurt; day illa oebbi, ar tama n Oebbi? Drus id tesmektayem
Day Win i kwen Inehhun, di tillas n lberr akked yill, id Ippaznen avu, d abecceo n ccira ueunu S; day illa oebbi, ar tama n Oebbi? Ay Aalay Oebbi, sennig wayen pcaraken
Day Win Ibeddun lxelq, sinna, Ippales as; ikwen I$aten seg igenni akked tmurt; day illa oebbi ar tama n Oebbi? Ini: "awit ed atebbet nnwen, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "tabavnit, di tmurt akked igenwan, ur p issin yiwen siwa Oebbi. Ur eoin melmi ara d kkren
Ih, tamusni nnsen ur tessawev ar laxeot? Xaii, nitni di ccekk fellas. Xaii, nitni, fellas, dre$len
Nnan wid ijehlen: "day ma nu$al d akal, am imezwura nne$, s tidep, fella$ tanekra
Ni$ waaaden a$ aya, i nekwni akw i imezwura nne$, zik. Ayagi, d timucuha kan imenza
Ini: "iniget di tmurt, walit amek tevoa d ibe$wviyen
Ur $webben fellasen, ur pxiqqi ilmend n nncub nnsen
Nnan: "melmi lemaahda agi, ma d tidep ay tessawalem
Ini: "kra n wayen i$ef tearem, ahat atan ivfeo kwen id
Mass ik, s tidep, meqqweo lfevl iS, $ef imdanen. Maca, tegwti degsen ur snemmiren
Mass ik, s tidep, Ieoa ayen teffren idmaren nnsen, akked wayen d qqaoen
Ur illi wayen iffren, deg igenni akked tmurt, ur nuri di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ih, Leqwoan agi ieekku d i At Isoail, tegwti n wayen i$ef mgarraden
Neppa, war ccekk, ard nnhaya akked ueunu i lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, ad Iseyyi garasen s ueuddu S. Neppa d Uzmir, d Amusnaw
Ppkel $ef Oebbi, ih, aql ak di tidep ipbegginen
Ih, kecc, ur tepparav lmeggtin ad slen, ur tepparav iaeeeugen ad slen i wancad, ma wexxoen
Ur fellak nnhaya ider$alen, mgal ttelfan nnsen. Ara islen, siwa wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£. Nitni d imvuaen
Mi iuao wawal fellasen, ad asen d Nessuffe$ lweec si tmurt; ad asen yini ar imdanen ur metbutit $ef issekniyen nne£
Ass ideg ara d Nefser, si yal lois, arbaa n wid inekoen issekniyen nne£, d tirni
alamma, mi d usan, ad Yini: "day tnekoem issekniyen iW, ur ten teskecmem di tmusni? Ne$ d acu tellam txeddmem
Iuao wawal fellasen, imi densen. Ur d pmeslayen
Day ur walan ara ar Nerra yasen iv i ureyyee nnsen, ass iwakken ad walin? Deg wayagi, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Ass uuuvu n lbuq, ad iagwad i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, siwa wid i S ihwan i Oebbi. A d asen akw $uoeS, s ueiwet
A pwaliv idurar i t$ilev sebken, la teddun am usigna. D igi n Oebbi i Iuegmen yal cci. Neppa, s tidep, Ieoa d acu txedmem
Win id iusan s ise$, ad iawi it yifen. Widak, assen, mevmunit si tugdi
Wid id iusan s tucmip, ad ppin wudmawen nnsen ar tmes. Ni$ a ppeppuqeiiim kan $ef wayen txeddmem
Pwamoe$ kan ad aabde$ Mass n temdint agi, i Ioqa. IneS yal cci. Pwamoe$ d ad ili$ seg imduaen
ad male$ Leqwoan. Win ipwanhan, ipwanha kan i iman is. Win innetlafen, ini: "nek d aneddao kan
Ini: "a neckeo Oebbi. Ad awen Issken issekniyen iS. A ten taaqlem". Mass ik ur I$effel ara $ef wayen txeddmem
Ism
Atnan issekniyen n Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ad ak d Neeku si tequii n Musa akked Feraun, s tidep, i ugdud iumnen
Ih, Feraun issem$weo iman is di tmurt; imezda$ ifeoq iten d ieoumen. Isrewrew iayfa segsen, izellu arrac nnsen, issidir tilawin nnsen. Ih, neppa seg ifessaden
Neb$a a Nfeooeo $ef wid irewrwen di tmurt, a ten Nerr d imeqwoanen, a ten Nerr d iweooaten
A ten Nesseqaad di tmurt. A Nessken i Feraun, Haman, akked iasekoiwen nnsen, ayen ppagwaden segsen
Nweeea i imma s n Musa: "ssuiiev it, sinna, ma tugadev fellas, err it ar wasif. Ur ppagwad, ur $webben. Ad am t id Nerr, u a t Nerr seg imazanen
Teddem it twacult n Feraun. Ad asen iu$al d acengu, d a$ilif. Ih, Feraun, Haman, akked iasekoiwen nnsen llan d imsaben
Tenna tmeiiut n Feraun: "d nnuib n tii, i nek akked kecc. Ur tneqq, ahat ad a$ infaa, ne$ a t nerr d mmit nne$". Nitni ur faqen ara
Temmar ed tasa n yimma s n Musa. Qoib it id tessken, lemmer ur Nzeyyeo ara ul is, iwakken a ppili si lmumnin
Tenna i ultma s: "evfeo it"! Teqquoa t si mbaid, nitni ur faqen
Uqbel, Negdel as tid iuuuiuven. Tenna: "ad awen ssekne$ axxam ar awen itkwelfen fellas, u nitni ad as bedden
Nerra t id i imma s, iwakken ad as kkawent wallen is, ur t$webben, iwakken a peeo ar lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Maca, tegwti degsen, ur ssinen
Mi meqqweo, ittaaqel, Nefka yas tussna, uuwab. Akka ay Nepkafi imdanen laali

Ikcem tamdint, di lweqt ideg stehzan imezda$ is. Iufa n sin irgazen pna$en, yiwen seg ueoum is, wayev seg icenga s. Win n ueoum is, issuter as d afus, mgal win n icenga s. Iwwet it Musa s lbunia, in$a t. Inna: "ayagi, seg igi n Cciian. Neppa, s tidep, d acengu n uuee, itellifen
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek dense$ iman iw, Semmee iyi". Isemmee as. Ih, Neppa Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Inna: "a Mass iw! S l$it iK felli, ur ppili$, d awez$i, si loiha ibe$wviyen
Iufa d iman is di temdint, iugad, iquoaa. Atan a d ipaaggiv $uoes, win i s d issutren afus, ass izeryen. Inna yas Musa: "kecc, s tidep, d im$eooeq n uuee
Acengu nnsen, mi ib$a a t iwwet, inna d: "a Musa! Day teb$iv ad iyi ten$ev, akken ten$iv yiwen, ivelli? Teb$iv kan a ppiliv d aqehhao di tmurt, ur teb$iv ara a ppiliv seg iaaoviyen
Iusa d urgaz si iierf n temdint, ippazal. Inna d: "a Musa! S tidep, imvebboen mlalen $ef loal ik, a k n$en. Effe$, nek, seg wid ik ipweuuin
Iffe$ segs, iugad, iquoaa. Inna: "a Mass iw! Sellek iyi seg ugdud imednas
Mi ibbwi tikli ar Madian, inna: "ahat Mass iw ad iyi Iawi d ubrid umain

Mi ibbwev s aman n Madian, iufa n arbaa n l$aci, la sswan. Iufa, di iierf nnsen, snat n tlawin, iifent lmal nnsent. Inna: "d acu txeddmemt"? Nnant ed: "ur nesswa alamma wexxoen imeksawen. Babat ne$ d am$ao ameqwoan
Issew asent, iu$al ar tili, inna: "a Mass iw! Nek oe$be$ $ef yal lxio, ar iyi d Tessersev
Tusa t id yiwet segsent, s tikli ikukran, tenna: "atan ak d issawal baba, a k ikafi imi $ tesswev". Mi ioue $uoes, u ieka yas i ivoan, inna: "ur ppagwad, tepwasellkev seg ugdud imednas
Yiwet segsent, tenna: "a baba! Eiief it d acrik, ih, yif icriken ik, iohed, muman
Inna: "b$i$, nek, ad ak fke$ yiwet si yissi yagi, s cceot a pxedmev $uoi iam iseggwasen. Ma tessawdev mraw, s leb$i k. Ur b$i$ a k hejjne$. Ad ak ili$, ma Irad Oebbi, seg iaaoviyen
Irra: "ayagi, gari yidek. A tin saadda$ ger snat n tallitin, ur ippili felli u$ilif. Oebbi d Awkil, $ef wayen id nenna
Mi ifukk Musa tallit, u iseyyee akked twacult is, iwala times ar tama n udrar. Inna i twacult is: "qqimet, wala$ times, ahat ad awen d awi$, segs, asali ne$ asafu, amar a ppesseemum
Mi ibbwev $uoes, ipwanced ed si ttejoa, di rif ayeffus n te$zut, deg umviq ioqan: "a Musa! S tidep, Nek d Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Veggeo taakwazt ik". Mi p iwala, la tesseeoiiiw amzun d azrem, ibren ur iwexxeo. "A Musa! Qeddem, ur ppagwad, aql ak, ih, di laman
Err afus ik di loib ik, a d iffe$ d amellal, ur ihlik. Sseqoeb ed $uoek i$il ik, ad ak tekkes tugwdi. Tigi d sin n ppbut s$uo Mass ik, i Feraun akked imvebboen is. Ih, nitni d agdud iballa$en
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek n$i$ yiwen segsen, ugade$ ad iyi n$en
Gma Harun yif iyi afeuuee umeslay. Azen it id yidi d amaiwen, ad iyi tebbet. Nek ugade$ ad iyi nekoen
Inna: "a Nesseohed tayepp ik s gma k. Ad awen Nefk, i sin, adabu; ur kwen id ppawven. S issekniyen nne£, d kunwi akked wid iddan yidwen ara irebeen
Mi ibbwev $uosen Musa, s issekniyen iberrzen, nnan: "ayagi, siwa sseur id innulfan. Ur nesli s waya, $uo ibabaten nne$ imezwura
Inna Musa: "Mass iw Ieoa sennig wiyav, anwa iwumi Ifka nnhaya s$uoeS, anwa ara d igwrin deg Uxxam. Imednas, s tidep, ur rebeen

Inna Feraun: "a yimvebboen, ur awen mli$ ara kra n oebbi, war nekkini. Ecaal iyi times ar talaxt, a Haman; bnu yi lbeoo aalayen; ahat ad ali$ ar OOebbi n Musa. Nek, s tidep, eesbe$ t seg wid iskiddiben
Neppa, akked iasekoiwen is, sme$woen iman nnsen di tmurt, war ssebba. £ilen, ar nitni, ur d ppu$alen $uone£
Neppa, akked iasekoiwen is, Neiief iten. Nger iten ar yill. Wali amek tevoa d imednas
Nerra ten d imeqwoanen i ineccden ar tmes. Ass n tnekra, ur ppusellken
Neqqen asen xezzu di ddunit agi. Ass n tnekra, nitni seg ucmiten
Ni$ Nefka Tazmamt i Musa, mbaad ma Nesqucc isuta imezwura. D tafat i imdanen, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Amar a d mmektin
Ur telliv ara di loiha utaram, mi Nseyya lameo i Musa. Ur telliv seg inagan
Maca, Nxelq ed tisuta, $wezzif laameo nnsent. Ur tellid seg imezda$ n Madian, la sen teqqarev issekniyen nne£. Maca, Nella Neppazen
Ur telliv ar tama n udrar, mi d Nessawel. Maca d aeunu s$uo Mass ik, iwakken a pnedrev agdud, u$uo ur d iusi uneddao, uqbel ik. Amar a d mmektin
Mulac, ma teuza ten tiyta id urwen ifassen nnsen, a d inin: "a Mass nne$! A lemmer i $ d Tuznev amazan, a neddu d issekniyen iK, a nili seg wid iumnen
Mi ten id tusa tidep s$uone£, nnan: "a lemmer id iusi am wayen id iusan i Musa"! Day ur ugin ara, zik, ayen id iusan i Musa? Nnan: "d sin sseurat". Mwafaqen, nnan: "nekwni nugi ten i sin
Ini: "awit ed Tazmamt, s$uo Oebbi, i yifen snat agi, i nnhaya, ad ddu$ yides, ma tessawalem tidep
Ma ur ak d rran ara, efhem ar ddan kan d lhawiyyat nnsen. Anwa innetlafen, sennig win iteddun d lhawiyya s, war nnhaya s$uo Oebbi? Oebbi, s tidep, ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Aql a£ Nessawwev asen awal, amendeo ma d mmektin
Umnen yis wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, uqbel tagi
Ma $oan asen t, ad inin: "numen yis. Ih, ar neppa d tidep, s$uo Mass nne$. Uqbel is, s tidep, nella d imvuaen
Wigi a ten id ias ukafi nnsen berdayen, $ef wayen ueboen, swexxioen tucmip s yise$, u seg wayen iten N$at, pseddiqen
Mi slan i yir awal, ad as veofen, u qaoen: "i nekwni igiten nne$, i kunwi igiten nnwen. Fellawen talwit. Ur neo$eb $ef at war tussna
Kecc, s tidep, ur tnehhuv win teemlev. Maca, Oebbi Inehhu win i S ihwan. Neppa, Yif akw akken Ieoa wid ipwanhan
Nnan: "ma nedda d nnhaya yidek, a nepwaxvef seg wakal nne$". Day ur ten Nesseqaad ara di loamaa n laman, u$uo d ppawvent yal l$ellat? D l$it s$uone£. Maca, tegwti degsen, ur eoin
Aceal Nesqucc n temdininn, cerraent di temaict nnsent. Atnan ixxamen nnsen, ay ten ized$en, deffir sen, siwa ixeiiayen. D Nekwni ay d iweooaten
Ur Isquccu Mass ik timdinin, alamma iuzen i imezda$ nnsent, amazan i sen immalen issekniyen nne£. Ur Nesquccu timdinin, mebla ma llan imezda$ nnsent, d imednas
Kra n wayen i wen ippunefken n cci, d zzhu n tmeddurt n ddunit, akked ccbue is. Ayen illan $eo Oebbi, yif it, ad idum kter. Day ur pmeyyizen ara
Day win iwumi Nefka lemaahda igerzen, u immuger ip, am win i Nezha s l$it n tmeddurt n ddunit; sinna, ass n tnekra, neppa seg wid ara d irsen
Ass ideg ara sen d Isiwel, ad Yini: "anda ten wid iyY tepcarakem, u tellam tepkabarem
A d inin wid i$ef iuao wawal: "a Mass nne$! Wigi i njeggee, njeggee iten, akken i nepwajeggee. A nzekki $ureK: macci d nekwni ay aabden
Ad asen inin: "naaoet wid tepcarakem". Ad ten naaoen, ur asen d pparan. Walan aaaqeb. A lemmer llan pwanhan
Ass ideg ara sen d Isiwel, ad Yini: "acu d terram i imazanen
Assen, ad dergen fellasen isalen, nitni ur pmesteqsayen
Ma d win isteooaen, iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan, ahat ad yili seg imerbae
Mass ik Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan, u Ismenyafa. Ur ten id iuae usmenyif. Gedha s Oebbi! I Aalay sennig wayen pcaraken
Mass ik Ieoa ayen iffren deg idmaren nnsen, akked wayen cennaen
Neppa d Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. I Neppa, annuz di tmezwarut, u di tneggarut. I Neppa aeuddu, $uoeS tu$alin nnwen
Ini: "acu tmeyyzem, ma Isse$li d Oebbi iv imezgi, fellawen, alamma d ass n tnekra? Anwa oebbi, war Oebbi, ara wen d iawin tafat? Day ur tsellem ara
Ini: "acu tmeyyzem, ma Issuli Oebbi ass imezgi, fellawen, alamma d ass n tnekra? Anwa oebbi, war Oebbi, ara wen d iawin iv, a ppestaafum degs? Day ur tepwalim ara
Seg ueunu S, Iga yawen iv akked wass, i ustaafu nnwen, akked unadi n lfevl iS. Amar a ppesnemmrem
Ass ideg ara sen d Isiwel, ad asen Yini: "anda ten wid iyY tepcarakem, u tellam tepkabarem
A d Nawi anagi, si yal lois. A Nini: "awit ed atebbet nnwen". Ad eoen ar tidep n Oebbi. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen
Ih, Qaoun illa seg ugdud n Musa. Iqeho iten. Nefka yas igerrujen; s tezmert ugraw ioehden, arfad n tsura nnsen. Mi s inna ugdud is: "ur zehhu! Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara izehwaniyen
Deg wayen i k Ifka Oebbi, nadi axxam aneggaru. Ur teppu amur ik, di ddunit. Elhu, akken i Ilha Oebbi $uoek. Ur ssaram lefsad di tmurt. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ifessaden
Inna: "ippunefk iyi kan, ilmend n tmusni i sai$". Day ur ieoa ara ar Oebbi Isqucc, uqbel is, ger isuta, wid i t iugaren di tezmert, isemmden kteo? Ur illi usteqsi ibe$wviyen, af ibekkaven nnsen
Iffe$ ed s agdud is, s ooeue is. Wid ib$an tameddurt n ddunit, nnan: "awufan nesaa am wayen ippunefken i Qaoun! Ih, neppa d bab n terkunt tabarart
Wid, iwumi teppunefk tmusni, nnan: "a ssexv nnwen! Ppwab n Oebbi yif it, i win iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Ara d iuae siwa win iueboen
Nger it seddaw tmurt, neppa akked uxxam is. Ur as telli terbaat ara t isellken, war Oebbi. Ur illi seg wid ipselliken iman nnsen
Wid issaramen amkan is, ivelli nni, u$alen nnan: "zi$ Oebbi Issugut ooeeq i win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS, u iwezzen. Lemmer ur a$ I$at ara Oebbi, yili Iger a$ seddaw tmurt. Ih, ur rebeen ijehliyen
Axxam nni aneggaru, a t Nerr i wid ijunben tem$weo akked usefsed, di tmurt. Tirect i wid ipeezziben
Win id iusan s yise$, ad iawi ayen it yifen. Win id iusan s tucmip, ihi, ad ppuqeiiin wid ixedmen tucmitin, $ef wayen kan xeddmen
Ih, Win Ilezmen fellak Leqwoan, war ccekk, a k id Irr s axxam. Ini: "Mass iw Yif akw akken Issen anwa id iusan s nnhaya, anwa i illan di ttelfan n uuee
Ur tessarmev ara, ad ak ed ters Tezmamt, lemmer macci d aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ur ppili d amaiwen ijehliyen
Ur k swexxioen seg issekniyen n Oebbi, deffir trusi nnsen $uoek. Nuj ar Mass ik, ur ppili seg wid ipcaraken
Ur naao, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven. Ur illi oebbi, siwa Neppa. Yal cci ad inger, siwa udem iS. IneS aeuddu. £ureS ara tu$alem
Alm
Day $ilen imdanen a ten ooen qqaoen: "numen", u nitni ur ppuhewwlen
Ni$ Nhewwel wid i ten id izwaren. War ccekk, ad Yissin Oebbi wid iqqaoen tidep, ad Yissin ikeddaben
Ne$ $ilen ad a£ zwiren wid ixedmen tucmitin? Dir it wayen peuddun
Win iggunin timlilit akked Oebbi, s tidep, a d ias, war ccekk, lajel n Oebbi. Neppa, Issel, d Amusnaw
Win ijuhden, ijuhed kan i iman is. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Iewao ara imavalen
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, ad asen Nekkes tucmitin nnsen, a ten Nkafi $ef wayen xeddmen ifuqen
Nweuua amdan ar lewqama, s imawlan is. Ma lezmen fellak, ad iyI tcarkev ayen ur tessinev, ur asen ppa$ awal. Tu$alin nnwen, $uoI. Ad awen Mle$ acu txeddmem
Wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, a ten Nessekcem ar iaaoviyen

Ger imdanen, wid iqqaoen: "numen s Oebbi". Ma meenen, deg ubrid n Oebbi, ad eesben ahewwel n medden, d aaaqeb n Oebbi. Mi d iusa l$elb, s$uo Mass ik, ar ad inin: "ih, nella yidwen". Day ur Ieoa ara Oebbi, i illan deg idmaren imavalen
War ccekk, Oebbi Issen wid iumnen, Issen ixabiten
Nnan wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "ddut d ubrid nne$, a nbibb tuccva nnwen". Nitni ur pbibbin acemma, si tuccva nnsen. S tidep, nitni d ikeddaben
War ccekk, ad bibben tiaekkwmin nnsen, akked tiaekkwmin nniven. Ih, ad ppusteqsin, ass n tnekra, af wayen id snulfuyen
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue, i ugdud is. Izde$ yides, agim kkes ed smuset iseggwasen. Ibbwi ten ueemmal, nitni d imednas
Nsellek it, neppa akked wid iddan di lbabuo. Nerra t d assekni i imavalen
Iboahim, mi inna i ugdud is: "aabdet Oebbi, eezzbet aS. Yif it wakka, i kunwi, lemmer teeoim
Taabdem kan tiaancuoin, war Oebbi. Tesnulfam d tikerkas. Ih, wid taabdem, war Oebbi, ur zmiren a kwen $iten. Ssutret l$it i Oebbi, aabdet eP, snemmret aS. £uoeS ara tu$alem
Ma tnekoem, ihi, uqbel nnwen, nekoen leoyus". I iwatan, i umazan, siwa assiwev ubeggen
Day ur walan ara, amek id Inezzu Oebbi lxelq, sinna, Ippales as. Ih, ayagi, i Oebbi, d ushil
Ini: "iniget di tmurt, walit amek id Inza lxelq. Sinna, Oebbi a d Iawi lxelq aneggaru. Ih, Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ikkat win i S ihwan; Ipeunu $ef win i S ihwan. £ureS jebbu nnwen
Ur tesfunnugem, kunwi, di tmurt, ne$ deg igenni. Ur tesaim, war Oebbi, bab ne$ asettao
Wid iugin issekniyen n Oebbi, akked temlilit yideS, widak ad aysen aeunu W. I widak, aaaqeb aqeoean
Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi d nnan: "en$et ep, ne$ sseo$et ep". Isellek it Oebbi, si tmes. Deg waya, s tidep, d assekni i ugdud iumnen
Inna: "teddmem kan tiaancuoin, war Oebbi. Temeemmalem di tmeddurt n ddunit, sinna, ass n tnekra, kra degwen ad nekoen wiyav, kra ad xzun wiyav. Axxam nnwen d times, ur awen illi usellak
Iumen it Lui. Inna: "nek, d iminig ar Mass iw. Ih, Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
N$at it s Iseaq akked Yaaqub. I tarwas, Nefka lambiyya, Tazmamt. Nefka yas taqviat is, di ddunit; u neppa, di laxeot, war ccekk, seg iaaoviyen
Lui, mi inna i ugdud is: "ih, aql akwen la txedmem laao, ur ixdim yiwen, zik, deg imavalen
La teppeddum, ih, ar irgazen, tgezzmem abrid, txeddmem ayen icemten, deg igrawen nnwen". Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi nnan: "awi a$ d aaaqeb n Oebbi, ma telliv seg wid issawalen tidep
Inna: "a Mass iw! Efk iyi afus, mgal agdud ifessaden
Mi d usan imceggaen nne£, ar Iboahim, s ubecceo, nnan as: "ih, a Nesqucc imezda$ n temdint agi. Imezda$ is, s tidep, d imednas
Inna d: "ni$ degs Lui". Nnan as: "Nekwni, Neeoa sennig akw, i illan degs. A t Naateq, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameiiut is, ara yilin seg wid igwran
Mi usan imceggaen nne£, ar Lui, i$wbel ilmend nnsen, ur izmir a ten ifukk. Nnan as: "ur ppagwad, ur $webbel. Nekwni a k Naateq, kecc d twacult ik, siwa tameiiut ik, ara yilin seg wid igwran

Ihi, wexxeo asen, ggani. Nitni, s tidep, la pganin
A Nnbi! Eezzeb i Oebbi, ur ppa$ awal i ijehliyen akked ixabiten. Oebbi, s tidep, Izga d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Ddu akked wayen i k d Ippuweeean, s$uo Mass ik. Ih, Oebbi Ippuxebbeo $ef wayen txedmem
Ppkel $ef Oebbi. Iqadd Oebbi d Awkil

Ur Irra ara Oebbi sin wulawen di tfekka n urgaz. Ur Irra ara tilawin nnwen, i tmetlem ar iarar n tyimmatin nnwen, d tiyimmatin nnwen. Ur irra ara wid id tessekrem, d tarwa nnwen. Ayagi, d awal nnwen, seg imawen nnwen. Oebbi Issawal tidep. Neppa Ippawi d ubrid

Ssiwlet asen am ibabaten nnsen; akka i iwqem ar Oebbi. Ma ur tessinen ara anwi ay d ibabaten nnsen, atmaten nnwen di ddin, d iqoiben nnwen. Ur illi u$ilif $ef wayen teffaliam degs, siwa ayen aammden wulawen nnwen. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

Nnbi iqoeb ar lmumnin, sennig iman nnsen. Tilawin is, d tiyimmatin nnsen. Wid ippemyilin, mqaoaben di Tezmamt n Oebbi, sennig lmumnin akked iminigen. Siwa ma tgam tajmilt i imeddukwal nnwen. Ayagi iura di Tezmamt
Mi Neiief si lambiyya lmitaq nnsen, u si kecc, si Nue, Iboahim, Musa, u si Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, Neiief segsen lmitaq lfayeq
iwakken ad Ietec imawlan n tidep, af tidep nnsen. Ihegga d, i ijehliyen, aaaqeb aqeoean
A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi. Mi d usan $uowen iasekoiwen, Nuzen asen d avu, akked iasekoiwen ur twalam. Oebbi Izga Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Mi wen d kkan sennig wen, seddawat wen, mi zzint wallen, ulawen bbwven s ijuxax, tepmeyyizem yal ameyyez $ef Oebbi
Dinna, ppwajeooben lmumnin, enhezzen s leqsee
Mi d nnan ixabiten, akked imehzulen n wul: "ay $ d Iwaaaed Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, siwa a$uoou
Mi d inna urbaa segsen: "a yAt Yatrib, ur illi umekkan i kunwi, u$alet"! Kra segsen ssutren tsrie i Nnbi, nnan: "ih, ixxamen nne$ aaran". Nitni, ur llin aaran, b$an kan ad rewlen
Ma kecmen ten id, si leriaf is, sinna, ssutren asen ad xubten, ad xubten. Cwii kan ara kukrun fellas
Ni$ llan auhden s Oebbi, uqbel, ar ur ppu$alen ar deffir. Aaahed s Oebbi ad ippuqeiii
Ini: "ur kwen tenfaa trewla, ma trewlem si tmeppant, ne$ si ioad. Ara tezhum, siwa tallit wezzilen
Ini: "anwa wa, ara kwen ikksen seg ufus n Oebbi, ma Ib$a yawen cceoo, ne$ Ib$a yawen aeunu"? Ur asen ppafen, war Oebbi, bab, ne$ asettao
Ni$ Oebbi Ieoa wid degwen, i ipaawwiqen, wid iqqaoen i watmaten nnsen: "Yyat $uone$"! Drus kan degsen, i ikecmen ioad

D imceeeiyen ar loiha nnwen. Ma tusa d tugdi, a ten twaliv la k pmuqulen, tezzint wallen nnsen, am win tessexciwit tmeppant. Ma tekkes tugdi, a kwen gezren s yilsawen uqviaen. D imceeeiyen $ef lxio. Wigi, ur uminen ara. Ihi, Imea Oebbi igiten nnsen. Ayagi, d ayen isehlen i Oebbi
£ilen ikabaren ur oueen ara. Lemmer a d asen ikabaren, ad ssirmen, ar nitni, di uueeoa ay llan, ar Waaoaben n uclue, steqsayen fellawen. Lemmer llan yidwen, cwii kan ara nna$en
Ni$, i kunwi, Amazan n Oebbi d amedya amxallef i win ippaooun Oebbi, akked was aneggaru, id ismektayen aias Oebbi
Mi walan lmumnin ikabaren, nnan: "ayagi d ayen i $ d Iwaaaed Oebbi, akked Umazan iS. Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, Ssawlen tidep". Ay sen irna kan, siwa liman akked wannuz
Ger lmumnin, llan irgazen i iiifen deg wayen i$ef auhden Oebbi. Garasen, wid ieellen timeooiwt nnsen, garasen wid ipganin. Ur bedlen mavi
Iwakken ad Ikafi Oebbi imawlan n tidep, $ef tidep nnsen, u ad Iaaqeb ixabiten, ma ihwa yaS, ne$ ad asen Issuref. Ih, Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ieeaa Oebbi wid ijehlen, s ieeccio nnsen. Ur ppaddamen lxio. Issuli Oebbi ioad i lmumnin. Oebbi Izga d Uohid, d Uzmir
Issers ed, si lebouj nnsen, wid i sen ifkan afus, seg wAt Tezmamt. Issekcem tugdi deg ulawen nnsen. Arbaa ten$am ten, arbaa teebsem ten
Irra kwen tweotem akal nnsen, ixxamen nnsen, ayla nnsen. D akal ur taafisem. Ih, Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
A Nnbi! Ini i tlawin ik: "maday teb$amt tameddurt n ddunit, akked ccbue is, yyamt a kwent $ite$, ad a kwent bru$, berru umain
Ma illa teb$amt Oebbi, Amazan iS, akked uxxam aneggaru, ihi, Ihegga d Oebbi, i taaoviyin, segkwent, arraz ameqwoaean
A tilawin n Nnbi! Tid segkwent ara iawin abekkav ufvie, a ppeppuaaqeb berdayen. Ayagi d ayen isehlen i Oebbi
Tin segkwent i iunzen i Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, u txeddem ayen ilhan, ad as Nefk arraz berdayen, u Nhegga yas d l$it ukyis

Ilimt deg ixxamen nnkwent. Ur pcebbieemt acebbee n at war tussna imenza. eEealemt, zekkimt, oavimt Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ib$a kan Oebbi a kwent ipwakkes nnkel, a tawacult n Uxxam. U, a kwent Izzizdeg nezzeh
Mmektitemt ed ayen i kwent $oan, deg ixxamen nnkwent, n issekniyen n Oebbi, akw n uuwab. Ih, Oebbi Izga d Laiif, Ippuxebbeo

Ih, imvuaen, timvuain, lmumnin argaz tameiiut, itubiyen, titubiyin, wid akked tid issawalen tidep, iueboiyen, tiueboiyin, wid akked tid ippagwaden, wid akked tid ipseddiqen, wid akked tid ippueumen, wid akked tid ipearaben $ef tuzzuft nnsen, wid akked tid id immektayen aias Oebbi; i wigi, Ihegga d Oebbi ssmae akked warraz abarar
Ur issefk ara i win, ne$ tin iumnen, ad smenyafen lameo nnsen, ma Iseyya d lameo Oebbi, akked Umazan iS. Win inuqmen Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, ni$ innetlaf ttelfan n uuee

Mi s ibra Zayed, Njewo ik yides, iwakken ur teppili lhejna i lmumnin, ma u$en tilawin n wid id ssekren, mara ad sent brun. Ad iuao lameo n Oebbi
Ur telli lhejna f Nnbi, deg wayen Ieeppem fellas Oebbi; d tannumi n Oebbi $ef imezwura. Lameo n Oebbi izga ipwafta
Wid issawaven tiboatin n Oebbi, i T ippagwaden, ur ppagwaden yiwen, siwa Oebbi. Oebbi Iqadd i uqeiii
Ur illi Mueemmed d ababat n yiwen seg irgazen nnwen, maca, d Amazan n Oebbi, u d aneggaru n lambiyya. Oebbi Izga Issen yal cci
A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed Oebbi, macci d izli

D Neppa i d Inuben fellawen, akked lmalayek, iwakken a kwen Issuffe$ si tillas ar tafat. Izga Ipeunu $ef lmumnin
Asmi ara T magren, azul nnsen d: "tifrat"! Ihegga yasen d arraz ukyis

i ineccden ar Oebbi, s tsrie iS; d asavef icaalen
Becceo lmumnin s lfevl ameqwoan i nitni, s$uo Oebbi
Ur ppa$ awal i ijehliyen akked ixabiten. Ur ssemeas, i ccum nnsen. Ppkel $ef Oebbi, Iqadd Oebbi d Awkil
A wid iumnen! Ma tu$em tid iumnen, sinna, tebram asent, uqbel ma tennulem tent, ur fellawen ad asent teesbem tallit. £itet pent, serreet asent, s wudem uwqim

A Nnbi! Neell ak tilawin iwumi tefkiv tiqviaen nnsent, tiklatin ik, si tid i k Iqsed Oebbi, iss is n aam ik, tid n taamtin ik, tid n xal ik, tid n txaltin ik iunagen yidek, tameiiut iumnen, ma tefka iman is i Nnbi, ma ib$a Nnbi a p ya$. D lemziyya i kecc, war lmumnin. Ni$ Neeoa acu i sen Nseyya af tlawin nnsen, akked teklatin nnsen. Iwakken ur teppili fellak lhejna. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

A ppesganiv tin i k ihwan segsent. A d tawiv $uoek tin i k ihwan, ne$ tin teb$iv si tid taazlev. Ur fellak tuzzma. Akka i iwulem, iwakken ad qenaant, ur $webbnent, ad oavint akw, ayen i sent tefkiv. Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg ulawen nnwen. Oebbi Izga d Amusnaw, Ieellem
Ur ak eellent tlawin, sya d asawen, ne$ abeddel n tlawin, xas taaoeb ik uuifa nnsent, siwa tiklatin ik. Oebbi Izga Issikid yal cci

A wid iumnen! Ur keccmet ar texxamin n Nnbi, ar awen iaammed, d inebgawen ar wucci, ur teggunim. Maca, ma tepwaaovem, kecmet. Mi teccam, sahlet; ur ssioxiset ameslay. Ayagi, s tidep, iqelleq Nnbi. Isetea segwen. Oebbi ur Ipsetei $ef tidep. Ma tessutrem asent ta$awsa, ssutret ep deffir tsabert. Yif it wakka, i tezdeg n wulawen nnwen, akked wulawen nnsent. Ur awen ilaq ara a pjjerim Amazan n Oebbi, ne$ a ppa$em tilawin is, deffir es, d awez$i. Ayagi, ad yili, ar Oebbi, d lefviea
Ama tessknem d leaoa, ne$ teffrem p, Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa yal cci

Ur telli tiyta degsent af ibabaten nnsent, arraw nnsent, atmaten nnsent, arraw n wamaten nnsent, arraw n tsetmatin nnsent, tilawin nnsent, ticrikin nnsent. Ad eezzbent i Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, d Anagi n yal cci
Oebbi akked lmalayek iS, s tidep, Nuban $ef Nnbi. A wid iumnen! Nubet fellas, ternum as azul aemayan
Ih, wid ijjerin Oebbi akked Umazan iS, Ixza ten Oebbi, di ddunit, di laxeot. Ihegga yasen d aaaqeb isdullun
Wid ijjerin lmumnin, argaz tameiiut, $ef wayen ur ksiben, ni$ bbwin acehrir akked ubekkav n uuee
A Nnbi! Ini i tlawin ik, i iss ik, i tlawin n lmumnin, ad jemaant ijufao nnsent. Ppif akka, a tent aaqlen, ur tent pooerin. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ma ur ebisen ara ixabiten, imehzulen n wul, akked wid ipxeooiven di Lmadina, ad ak Nebges $uosen. Sinna, siwa cwii n tallit ara yilin, degs, d loiran ik
Ad pwaxzun anda ten nufan, ad pwaiifen, ad pwan$en akw
D tannumi n Oebbi ar wid iaaddan zik. Ur teppafev, d awez$i, abeddel, di tannumi n Oebbi
Steqsan k imdanen, af yimir. Ini: "it Issnen siwa Oebbi". Anwa ad ak imlen, amar imir iqeob ed
Oebbi, s tidep, Ixza ijehliyen, Ihegga yasen d u$ud
Ad wekkoen degs, i lebda; ur ppafen bab, ne$ asettao
Ass ideg ara zzin wudmawen nnsen, ar tmes, ad inin: "a yamxix nne$! A lemmer nunez i Oebbi, u nunez i Umazan
Ad inin: "a Mass nne$! Nekwni nunez i igeldan nne$, i imeqwoanen nne$, telfen a$ ar yir abrid
A Mass nne$! Aaqeb iten berdayen, u Xzu ten s leqsee

A wid iumnen! Eezzbet i Oebbi, tinim awal umain
Ad awen Iueggem igiten nnwen, ad Isemmee ibekkaven nnwen. Win iouvan Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ni$ ibbwi arraz ameqwoaean
Naaoev a nefk lamana i igenwan, i tmurt, i idurar. Ugin a p iifen. Ugaden p. Ibubb ip umdan. Neppa ard amednus ur nessin
Ihi, ad Isaaddi Oebbi aaaqeb af ixabiten akked txabitin, wid akked tid ipcaraken. Ad Issuref Oebbi i wid akked tid iumnen. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ccekoan i Oebbi, i iIan i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. I Neppa, ccekoan di laxert. Neppa, d Bab n uuwab, Ippuxebbeo
Ieoa ayen ikeccmen di tmurt, ayen id iteff$en segs, ayen id iprusun seg igenni, ayen ippalin $uoes. Neppa Ipeunu, Ipsemmie

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur a$ d ippas yimir". Ini: "xaii, s Mass iw, ara kwen id ias"! Amusnaw n tbavnit, ur idrig fellaS ubruy ubelkim, ama deg igenwan, ama di ddunit; ama seddaw wannect is, ama sennig es; akw, di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ad Ikafi wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan. I wigi, ssmae akked ooeeq ukyis
Wid ikkaten deg issekniyen nne£, sfunnugen, widak, fellasen aaaqeb n twa$it taqeoeant
Wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni, walan ar ayen id irsen $uoek, s$uo Mass ik, d tidep. Ippawi s abrid n Uzmir, Amaazuz
Nnan wid ijehlen: "day ad awen nessken argaz, ar awen d yinin ar ma teftutsem, yal aftutes, i kunwi lxelq amaynut
Iger ed tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ d aoehbani"? Xaii, wid ur numin ara s laxeot, haaten deg uaaqeb, akked ttelfan u$miq

Day ur walan ara ayen illan zdat sen, u deffir sen, di tmurt akked igenwan? Ma ihwa ya£, a ten Nger seddaw tmurt, ne$ a d Nesse$li fellasen igezzim seg igenni. Deg wayagi, ih, d assekni i yal amdan ucaif
Ni$ Nefka s$uone£ lfevl i Dawed. A yidurar, alset yides akked ifrax. Nerra yas uzzal d aleqqaq
Eunaa tibedaiyin n wuzzal, qiss tindar. Xeddmet ayen ilhan. Nek, Pwali$ ayen txeddmem
I Sliman: avu. Win n uubee, aggur; win n tmeddit, aggur. Nelli yas taawint n nneas. Kra n leonun ad xedmen fellas, s tsrie n Mass is. Win degsen, iveofen i lameo nne£, Nessukk fellas, aaaqeb ujajie
Xeddmen as ayen ib$a: leowamaa, tiaancuoin, loefnat am ievunen, ticcuytin iqaaden. Exdem s tnemmirt, a tawacult n Dawed, drus n yimdanen iW i isnemmiren
Mi Nseyya fellas tameppant, ur as faqen ara immut, armi icca taakwazt is, ubaaauc n wakal. Mi i$li, eulfan leonun ar, lemmer day ssinen tabavnit, ur qqimen deg uaaqeb isdullun
Ni$, i Saba, assekni di tnezdu$in nnsen. Snat tebeirin, ta yeffus, ta zelmev. Eccet si l$it n Mass nnwen, u snemmret aS. Tamurt ilhan, Mass Ipsemmieen
Wexxoen. Nuzen asen aeemmal n Aarim. Tibeirin nnsen, nerra tent d tibeirin id ippaken l$ella oeagen, tammemayt, akked tzegwart taxeiiayt
Akka ay ten Nqeiii $ef tijehli nnsen. Day a Nqeiii wur nejhil
Nerra garasen u ger temdinin i$ef Nburek, timdinin id ivehoen. Nektal tikli garasent: "mereet degsent di laman, am yiv, am ass
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Zzi$wzef tallit ger zziaoat nne$"! Densen iman nnsen. Nerra ten d tiquivin. Nesqucc iten wakali. Ih, deg wayagi, war ccek, d issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren
Ni$ Iblis itebbet ed, segsen, ameyyez is. Vefoen t, siwa arbaa si lmumnin
Ur isai kra udabu fellasen. Iwakken kan, a Nissin anwa iumnen s laxeot, u anwa i illan, fellas, di ccekk. Mass ik Ipearab af yal cci
Ini: "naaret wid i tepkabarem, war Oebbi. Ur sain taeeyt ubelkim, deg igenwan ne$ di tmurt; ur criken degsen; ur aS illi, garasen, umaiwen
Cafuaa, s$uoeS, tenfaa kan win iwumi ip Irad. Alamma, ma tekkes tugdi seg wulawen nnsen, a d inin: "acu id Inna, Mass nnwen"? A d inin: "d tidep, u Neppa d Aalayen, d Ameqwoan
Ini: "anwa ikwen ip$aten, si tmurt akked igenwan"? Ini: "d Oebbi". Nekwni am kunwi, amendeo ma nella di nnhaya, ne$ di ttelfan n uuee
Ini: "ur teppuqeiiim $ef wayen nfalia, ur neppuqeiii $ef wayen txeddmem
Ini: "ad a$ Issemlil Mass nne$, sinna, ad Ieudd garane$, s tidep. Neppa d Ameaddi Amusnaw
Ini: "sseknet iyi d wid i tqeonem $uoeS, d icriken"! Xaii, Neppa d Oebbi Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Ur k id Nuzen, i imdanen, armi d uqnia; a pbecooev, a pnedoev. Maca, tegwti n yimdanen, ur ssinen
Qqaoen: "melmi lemaahda agi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "$uowen ppaaud ass, ur tezmirem a t teswexxoem, ne$ a t id tesqeobem, s saaa

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur neppamen, d awez$i, s Leqwoan agi, ne$ s wayen it id izwaren". Lemmer a pwaliv mara bedden imednas, ar Mass nnsen, pmeslayen garasen. Ad inin uohifen i imzuxiyen: "lemmer macci d kunwi, yili nella d lmumnin
Ad inin imzuxiyen i uohifen: "day d nekwni ikwen isfeo$en af nnhaya, mi kwen id iusa? Xaii, tellam d ibe$wviyen

Ad inin uohifen, i imzuxiyen: "xaii! Nncub, iv akked wass, mi teeppmem, fellane$, a nagwi Oebbi, u ad aS negg tanudda". Ffren nndama mi walan aaaqeb. Nerra tiqwlavin $ef imegoav n wid ijehlen. Day ara ppuqeiiin $ef wayen ur xdimen
Ur Nuzen ara kra uneddao ar temdint, mebla ma nnan imeokantiyen is: "nekwni, ih, nugwi ayen is id teppuceggaam
Nnan: "nekwni, n$elb ik ayla, tarwa. Ur nelli d wid ara ippuqeiiin
Ini: "ihi Mass iw Ip$iti win i S ihwan u Iwezzen; maca, tegwti n imdanen, ur ssinen
Macci d ayla nnwen, ne$ d tarwa nnwen, ara kwen id ieeieen nezzeh $uone£, siwa wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan. I nitni arraz berdayen, ilmend n wayen xedmen. Ad ilin, di laman, di t$uofatin
Ma d wid ikkaten deg issekniyen nne£, sfunnugen, widak a d rsen i uaaqeb
Ini: "ih, Mass iw Ip$iti win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Iwezzen as. Ayen akw ara tefkem n cci, ad awen t id Irr. Neppa, Yif akw im$iten
Ass ideg ara ten Ifser, akken ma llan, imiren ad Yini i lmalayek: "wigi, day llan aabden kwent
A d inint: "gedha s yiseK! D Kecc ay d Bab nne$, war nitni. Xaii, llan aabden leonun. Tegwti degsen umnen yissen
Assa, ur imlik yiwen i wayev, segwen, aba$uo ne$ ccqa. A Nini i wid idensen: "jeoobet aaaqeb n tmes, i tellam tnekoem t

Ma $oan asen issekniyen nne£ ipbegginen, ad inin: "wagi d argaz kan, i ib$an a kwen istixeo, seg wayen llan aabden imezwura nnwen". Ad inin: "ayagi, siwa d tikerkas id innulfan". Wid ijehlen i tidep, mi ten id tusa, ad inin: "ayagi d sseur n uuee kan
Ur asen Nefki tizmamin, ara lemden; ur asen d Nuzen, uqbel ik, aneddao
Skaddben wid i ten id izwaren. Ur asen tebbwiv ara tis mraw n wayen i ippunefken mi skaddben imazanen iW. A tuzzma W, imiren
Ini: "ar yiwet kan, ara kwen nabi$: a pbeddem zdat Oebbi, di sin, ne$ weeeedwen; sinna, a d tesmektim. Ameddakwel nnwen ur illi d aoehbani. Neppa d aneddao nnwen kan, uqbel aaaqeb uqsie
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat; apan nnwen. Ih, taqdiat iw, ar Oebbi kan. Neppa, $ef yal cci, d Anagi
Ini: "ih, Mass iw Ipqeddim tidep, d Amusnaw n tbavnit
Ini: "tusa d tidep, ur d nezzunt tkerkas, ur d ppalsent
Ini: "ma nnetlafe$, nnetlafe$ kan i iman iw. Ma pwanha$, d ayen iyi d Iweeea Mass iw. Neppa, ih, d Aqoib, Isell
Lemmer a pwaliv mi xelaan, tarewla ur telli. Pwaiifen, si tama iqeoben
Nnan: "numen yis". Amek ara d ssiwven, si tama ibaaden
Ni$ llan zik, nekoen t. Rran akin tabavnit, si tama ibaaden
Ad yili ufuil, garasen d wayen ctaqen, akken tevoa, zik, d wid i ten icban. Ih, nitni llan di ccekk imcebbwel
Ccekoan i Oebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, i Irran lmalayek d timersulin sut sin, krav, akked kue iferrawen. Irennu, di lxelq, ayen i S ihwan. Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer i yal cci
Ayen Ifka Oebbi ueunu, i medden, ur t itekkes yiwen. Ayen Iiief, ur izmir yiwen a t id iazen, deffir eS. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
A yimdanen! Mmektit ed a$iti nnwen s$uo Oebbi. Day illa uxellaq, war Oebbi, ikwen ioeeqen seg igenni akked tmurt? Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, ihi acimi tessaawajem
Ma nekoen k, ni$ pwanekoen imazanen, uqbel ik. Ar Oebbi, ara qqlen lumuo
A yimdanen! Ih, lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Ur kwen tep$uoou tmeddurt n ddunit! Ur kwen ipkellix um$weooi, af Oebbi
